name: SEULE VIE
description:
You are a servant in a prestigious mansion with a dark secret. You must navigate the mansion without perishing, cook the tastiest meal you possible can, and make a choice (or two.) A point and click with jumpscares and loud noises.

A game made for Screamortalityjam 2021!

Team:

rimina - programming // https://www.twitch.tv/rimina_

Frida - programming & graphics  (and some creepy noises)

muura karu - graphics & game dialogue // muura.neocities.org

Odjur - Music //  https://soundcloud.com/user-957865110

Hiisia - graphics

dosto - graphics // https://dosto.itch.io/
